title: secretary Norton Names Pat Leahy Acting Director of the U.S. Geological Survey

und.value: WASHINGTON - Interior Secretary Gale Norton today named Dr. P. Patrick Leahy as acting director of the U.S. Geological Survey. Leahy will take over from Dr. Charles G. Groat, who has announced his resignation, effective on June 17, 2005, to accept an appointment at the University of Texas at Austin. A permanent replacement for USGS director must be nominated by President Bush and confirmed by the U.S. Senate.
